<!-- Generated by Harlequin Webmaker 2.1.3; Transducer 1.0.2 --> <HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE> Foundations and Tools for Surface Modeling</TITLE> </HEAD> <BODY> <H1> Foundations and Tools for Surface Modeling</H1> Principal Investigator: <A HREF="../faculty/jorg.html">J&ouml;rg Peters</A><P> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <P> Developing splines over irregular meshes capable of modeling smooth free-form surfaces; smoothness scales and techniques should extend existing tools for tensor product B-splines. Improving the shape of surfaces by perturbing and optimizing over the spline parameters.<P> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> </BODY> </HTML> </HTML>
